flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I had a stack of old CDs lying around. For a long time I was planning to reuse them for a different purpose but I had no clue. Then one day while I was surfing on the Internet I found an interesting idea to convert these into great artwork that can be put up on the walls. I liked this idea because I thought it was very easy to do, just few simple steps. The final product turns out to be pretty good.
guide.introduction_rendered: I had a stack of old CDs lying around. For a long time I was planning to reuse them for a different purpose but I had no clue. Then one day while I was surfing on the Internet I found an interesting idea to convert these into great artwork that can be put up on the walls. I liked this idea because I thought it was very easy to do, just few simple steps. The final product turns out to be pretty good.

lines.text: Anything with sharp point to scratch the color (I used a screwdriver.)
lines.text_raw: Anything with sharp point to scratch the color (I used a screwdriver.)

lines.text: The shiny side of the CD shows rainbow colors when light falls on it. We are going to use this side.
lines.text_raw: The shiny side of the CD shows rainbow colors when light falls on it. We are going to use this side.

lines.text: Apply the acrylic color on the shiny side. Here I have used a black color. Make sure you have a thick layer of this color so that it becomes easy to scratch the color later.
lines.text_raw: Apply the acrylic color on the shiny side. Here I have used a black color. Make sure you have a thick layer of this color so that it becomes easy to scratch the color later.

lines.text: Draw your favorite design on the colored side.
lines.text_raw: Draw your favorite design on the colored side.

lines.text: With the help of a screwdriver scratch the color along the outline of the design. Try not to scratch very hard otherwise you’ll damage the shiny coating.
lines.text_raw: With the help of a screwdriver scratch the color along the outline of the design. Try not to scratch very hard otherwise you’ll damage the shiny coating.

lines.text: You may also want to scratch the inside of the design to make it more interesting.
lines.text_raw: You may also want to scratch the inside of the design to make it more interesting.

lines.text: Put the finished CD art on the wall using blue-tac.
lines.text_raw: Put the finished CD art on the wall using blue-tac.

guide.summary: This guide shows you one of the ways to reuse your old CDs.
